text: Pumpkin Café Shop is a chain of café shops located at hospitals, ports and railway stations in Great Britain. It is a sub-brand owned by the SSP Group, which owns or franchises many other food shop brands such as Caffè Ritazza and Upper Crust. The shops sell food and hot and cold drinks. As of 2016, the chain manages 126 shops. ==References== Category:Catering and food service companies of the United Kingdom Category:Coffee houses of the United Kingdom Category:SSP Group
title: Pumpkin Café Shop
